questions.question: What is the best book you've ever read and why?

answers.answer: The best book that i ever read is Harry Potter. There are a lot of reason to choise this book. First, it's a story who talk about a magic world but it's during ur times.
Second, are there a lot of magic. When we read this book, it's like if we were in an incredible dream and it's amazing !
In last, this book and the writer are really popular. It's really good write.
Harry Potter's book is the first book that i have "oneshot". I think that this book has between 500 and 600p but i had only need 2days to end it.
